summary: SummaryDior Capture Pro-Collagen Shot is a high-precision booster that gives the eye area an instant and long-lasting lifting effect. Sagging eyelids are visibly lifted and skin feels firmer.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis high-performance eye care features a biotech collagen fragment, the signature OX-C Treatment technology, and patented polymers. It visibly rejuvenates skin lacking collagen for an instant lifting effect. Its cool metal applicator is designed for precise and targeted application.Research ResultsHIGH PERFORMANCE MEASURED ON 6 EYE SHAPESPro-Collagen Shot visibly rejuvenates skin lacking collagen to visibly restore tightness and structure in the eye areaEyelids appear lifted: +57% tighter skin instantly¹Skin feels firmer: 2x firmer in 7 days² and 6x firmer in 28 days³Skin foundation appears denser: +27% in 7 days, +42% in 28 days⁴¹ Biotensegrity measured by image analysis on 33 subjects. ² Clinical evaluation by a dermatologist on the evolution of the performance of Pro-Collagen Shot - 30 subjects. Comparison of the immediate effect vs. after 1 week.³ Clinical evaluation by a dermatologist on the evolution of the performance of Pro-Collagen Shot - 30 subjects. Comparison of the immediate effect vs. after 1 month. ⁴ Instrumental test on 30 subjects.Item 2644500How To UseAfter Dior Capture Eye Creme, apply a drop of Pro-Collagen Shot on the inner corners of the eye - under the eye and under the brown bone.Smooth on the gel with the applicator.Tap with the fingertips to help it absorb.Wait a few seconds to optimize the tightening effect.Gently dab on Dior Forever Skin Correct concealer.IngredientsAqua (Water), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Diglycerin, Algin, Hydroxypropyl Starch, Lilium Candidum Bulb Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Adenosine, Sodium Tocopheryl Phosphate, Palmaria Palmata Extract, Polyglycerin-3, Xylitol, Chlorphenesin, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Hydroxyacetophenone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Betaine, Sodium Surfactin, Polyglycerin-6, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Sodium Citrate, Pentylene Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Hydroxide, Acetyl Dipeptide-1 Cetyl Ester, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Tin Oxide, Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Silica, Jasmine Oil/Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Collagen Amino Acids, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After Dior Capture Eye Creme, apply a drop of Pro-Collagen Shot on the inner corners of the eye - under the eye and under the brown bone.Smooth on the gel with the applicator.Tap with the fingertips to help it absorb.Wait a few seconds to optimize the tightening effect.Gently dab on Dior Forever Skin Correct concealer.
